greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n * Sum_(q|n) 1 / q, where q are noncomposite numbers (A008578) dividing n.
comment: For n > 1, a(n) = n + n * Sum_(p|n) 1 / p, where p are primes dividing n.
formula: a(n) = A080339(n) * A000027(n), where operation * denotes Dirichlet convolution, i.e. convolution of type: a(n) = Sum_(d|n) b(d) * c(n/d).
For p, q = distinct primes, a(p) = p + 1, a(pq) = pq - 1.
results.author: _Jaroslav Krizek_, Oct 25 2013
